bedroom.name: Bedroom
bedroom.description: A small room with a bed, a dresser, and some scattered books.

items.key: A small brass key. It probably opens something.
items.notebook: An old leather notebook filled with scribbles.

dresser.description: An old oak dresser. One drawer is slightly open.

interactions.open: You open the dresser and find nothing but dust.
interactions.search: You find an old photo tucked in the corner.

bed.description: A messy, unmade bed with crumpled sheets.

interactions.sleep: You lie down briefly but don't fall asleep.
interactions.search: You find a coin under the pillow.

hallway.name: Hallway
hallway.description: A long corridor with creaky wooden floors.

painting.description: A faded painting of a ship at sea.

interactions.look behind: You find a crack in the wall, but nothing more.
